hero.welcome: Hello, welcome to my portfolio, i am Vitor.
hero.title: Decoding problems, coding solutions.
hero.description: I am a Full stack developer. Currently working with javascript, using mostly React.js and Node.js.

about.title: about me
about.p1: My name is Vitor Silva. I am a programmer based in Brazil. I have been studying programming since 2020, and I am passionate about development. I always strive to give my best in any work I do.
about.p2: I am a quick learner, highly curious, and dedicated.
about.s: My goal is to develop software solutions that improve and simplify people's lives, and have a great impact in society.

contact.confirmation: Your message was sent successfully, Thank you!
